title: Looking for regular group of people to play with (bronze to silver)
body:
Hey guys, we all know league if more fun when queuing with a team. So I want to find some competitive people to play more regularly with and climb the ladder.
Would pref more mature people (ie no squeakers), im 22 and have variuous voice comms

I ended up b5 last season (1st season) and then placed b1 in flex before being demoted to b5 from the last patch after winning one game, lol.
I feel like my elo is around b2 to b1.

I try to play the team game, dont flame up and play the objectives. I usually mid or adc but happy to play any role really.
So hit me up if you want to play, ign is PatrikkStar

replies.body: Wouldnt mind playing with ya, want to rank up with a team as well . Username: RE44PR
